/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, there are buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban structures. The road itself is lined with a white fence, adding a touch of elegance to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the buildings and trees, making them appear larger and more imposing. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of urban development and natural beauty.
